title: Watchmen
summary: Set in an alternate history where superheroes emerged in the 1940s and 1960s, the story follows a group investigating the murder of one of their own.

title: V for Vendetta
summary: Set in a dystopian future United Kingdom after a nuclear war, a masked vigilante fights against a fascist government.

title: Can't Hurt Me
summary: David Goggins shares his life story and reveals that most of us tap into only 40% of our capabilities.

title: The Practice of Groundedness
summary: A practical guide to finding lasting success, happiness, and fulfillment without sacrificing health, relationships, and internal peace.

title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
summary: The multi-generational story of the Buend√≠a family, whose patriarch founded the fictional town of Macondo, Colombia.

title: Love in the Time of Cholera
summary: A love story that spans fifty years and explores the power of love in its many forms.

title: Atomic Habits
summary: An easy and proven way to build good habits and break bad ones.

title: The Book of Five Rings
summary: A text on kenjutsu and the martial arts in general, written by the Japanese swordsman Miyamoto Musashi.

title: Think Again
summary: The power of knowing what you don't know and learning to rethink and unlearn.

title: Give and Take
summary: A revolutionary approach to success, examining how giving can lead to greater success than taking.

title: Deep Work
summary: Rules for focused success in a distracted world, arguing for the importance of deep, concentrated work.

title: Digital Minimalism
summary: A philosophy of technology use in which you focus your online time on a small number of carefully selected activities.

title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
summary: The first adventure of Harry Potter, a young wizard who discovers his magical heritage and begins his education at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
summary: In Harry's second year at Hogwarts, a mysterious chamber is opened and students are being petrified.

title: The Lost Treasure of the Emerald Eye
summary: Geronimo Stilton embarks on a treasure hunt after finding a mysterious map.

title: The Curse of the Cheese Pyramid
summary: Geronimo Stilton travels to Egypt to write about the famous Egyptian cheese pyramids.

title: Peak Performance
summary: A book about elevating your game, avoiding burnout, and thriving with the science of success.

title: Never Finished
summary: A memoir that offers a raw, powerful, and profoundly inspiring account of how to master your mind and defy the odds.

title: Dorodango
summary: A graphic novel exploring the Japanese art of polishing mud into perfect spheres as a metaphor for finding perfection in simplicity.

title: The Way Forward
summary: A practical guide to establishing habits that lead to lasting positive change and continuous self-improvement.
